description: This scholarship is in memory of Michael Roy Finerty who attended Central State University for one year and thereafter died in the service of his country in South Vietnam. This is intended for students majoring in English who show financial need.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Major is English   or SIS_Major is English Education   or SIS_Major is English-Creative Writing   or SIS_Major is English-20th & 21st Century St   or SIS_Major is English-Composition & Rhetoric   or SIS_Major is English-Composition Skills   or SIS_Major is English-Contemporary Lit   or SIS_Major is English-Creative Studies   or SIS_Major is English-Teaching ESL   or SIS_Major is English-Traditional Studies
